title: Project Scoping - Respond to RFP
description: A large company has issued a formal Request for Proposal (RFP) for a complete managed IT services contract.

tasks.description: Thoroughly review the RFP to understand all requirements, from technical needs to service level agreements.
tasks.expected_outcome: The sales team has a complete understanding of the request.

tasks.description: Write a detailed proposal document that addresses every point in the RFP, outlining the proposed services, team, and methodology.
tasks.expected_outcome: A comprehensive and professional proposal is written.

tasks.description: Develop a detailed pricing proposal for all requested services.
Submit the complete proposal package by the RFP deadline.
tasks.expected_outcome: The proposal is submitted on time.
